hero.tag: The First Living AI Bot for Communities
hero.title: MAWA ‚Äî AI, Interaction, Community
hero.description: MAWA merges a next-gen AI community manager with a robust token ecosystem on Solana. More than a bot, a true AI member.

vision.title: Our Vision: From Scripts to Soul
vision.text: Today's communities grow fast, but their bots stay cold and scripted. MAWA changes everything by blending human warmth with AI intelligence. It speaks, jokes, moderates, and adapts, becoming the living soul of your group, powered by the $MAWA token.

features.title: Smart Moderation
features.desc: Proactively handles spam, scams, and toxic behavior to keep communities safe.

features.title: Automatic Engagement
features.desc: Keeps chats alive with contextual memes, polls, quizzes, and fun replies.

features.title: Adaptive Personality
features.desc: Speaks the language of your community, from crypto degens to professional gamers.

features.title: Voice Interaction
features.desc: Talk to MAWA in real-time in voice channels, just like another member of the group.

phases.desc: Premium branding, website launch, and initial community building.
Launch basic AI bot for pilot testing; expand social engagement.
Official $MAWA launch on Jupiter; integrate token for payments and premium features.
Launch advanced multi-platform AI (Telegram/Discord); list on major DEXs.
Pursue CEX listings and develop the ecosystem with rewards, NFTs, and merch.

items.q: Is MAWA an AI project or a memecoin?
items.a: Both. MAWA is fundamentally an AI technology project. The $MAWA token is the utility and governance token that powers its ecosystem, giving it the vibrant energy of a memecoin community.

items.q: What does the AI bot actually do?
items.a: MAWA acts as a community manager. It automates moderation, creates engagement (memes, polls), adapts its personality to your group, and can even join voice chats.
Crocodiles symbolize resilience, patience, and strength‚Äîqualities that reflect our long-term vision for building a lasting and powerful project.

items.q: What is the utility of the $MAWA token?
items.a: The token will be used for paying for premium bot features, staking to unlock exclusive AI personalities, and participating in governance decisions for the project's future.
Yes, the liquidity pool will be locked for 12 months upon launch to ensure trust and stability for the community.

how_to_buy.title: How to Buy $MAWA
steps: Connect to Jupiter Aggregator and swap SOL for $MAWA.
